column2: House for Sale in Dehiwala
column6: This house is situated in a tranquil and peaceful highly residential in a well secured convenient location on a well carpeted 20 feet road close to 250m off Anderson Road, Dehiwala close to the Nedimala and Hill Street and is situated with close proximity to supermarkets, leading International and local schools, also close to banks, hospitals, places of worship, the post office etc,it is only about twenty minutes drive to downtown Colombo and close to most of the towns in and around Colombo and the suburbs, from this location.It is a spacious single storey (two unit) house with a separate entrance to the annex, main house consists of a spacious sitting and dinning room, three bed rooms including a spacious master bed room with all rooms having an attached bathroom with hot water supply, an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards, a laundry and storage room, and a separate servants room with a separate toilet. The house has fully tiled floors, three phase electricity supply, air conditioners and fitted ceiling fans for most of the areas and veranda overlooking the garden and entrance with parking for 2 cars.The annex consists of a sitting area, TV lounge,one large bedroom with an attached bathroom, and an elegant pantry area with fitted cupboards.
